data.title: About: Tuanku Zara Salim
data.meta_description: Tuanku Zara Salim (née Zara Salim Davidson; born 22 March 1973) is married to Sultan Nazrin Muizzuddin Shah, who is the reigning Sultan of Perak. She has been conferred the title of Raja Permaisuri (Queen consort) of Perak by the Dewan Negara Perak on 20 June 2014.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Tuanku Zara Salim (lahir Zara Salim Davidson; lahir 22 Maret 1973) adalah Raja Muda (Putra Mahkota) Perak, Raja Dr Nazrin Shah. Sejak pernikahannya pada tanggal 17 Mei 2007 ia menjadi Raja Puan Besar Perak. (in)

Tuanku Zara Salim (née Zara Salim Davidson; born 22 March 1973) is married to Sultan Nazrin Muizzuddin Shah, who is the reigning Sultan of Perak. She has been conferred the title of Raja Permaisuri (Queen consort) of Perak by the Dewan Negara Perak on 20 June 2014. A chemical engineer by training, she was heading an oil and gas consultancy firm based in Kuala Lumpur before her marriage to the Sultan. She and the Sultan, who had been the country's most eligible royal bachelor for decades, have known each other since the mid-1990s. She was officially crowned as the Raja Permaisuri of Perak during Sultan Nazrin's enthronement ceremony as the 35th Sultan of Perak on 6 May 2015. (en)

Tuanku Zara Salim (Ipoh, 22 marzo 1973), è la Raja Permaisuri di Perak dal 2014. Ingegnere chimico di formazione, attualmente dirige una società di consulenza in materia di petrolio e gas con sede a Kuala Lumpur. Lei e il sultano, che era stato uno degli scapoli reale più ambiti, si sono conosciuti nella metà degli anni novanta. (it)
